ovdesc.p: This file is used to set up parameters for use in the VAULT CONTROL application
This application controls whether or not the Vault (T24 Safecustody funcationality) is turned on or off, and which depositories is is turned on or off for.
If the Vault is active then VAULT.EXPECT records can be produced from which the VAULT.CONTROL - certificate file - can be updated.

Field controlloing whether or not VAULT.CONTROL records can be removed from the Vault (using the REMOVE field) if they have a trade attached.

Only input of YES or NO allowed. YES indicates that VAULT.CONTROL records that were created by a trade can be removed from the VAULT - subject to override. NO indicates that VAULT.CONTROL records that were created by a trade cannot be removed from the Vault.
Only input of YES or NO allowed.
Will default to NO.
The key to the VAULT.PARAMETER is the ID of the COMPANY that the Vault is for.

Depositories in use for Vault control purposes This field controls wheich depositories will update the Vault. The Depositories can be input individually, ALL can be input to signify all Depositores or NONE can be input to signify No Depositories.
Mandatory field.
Input can be 'ALL', 'NONE' or a valid DEPOSITORY form the CUSTOMER.SECURITY application.
